about_the_game:
This is demo i will make a lot of changes every month
SkySouls is a Third Person Action and Adventure Game in the style of D.Souls but with a story told with epic cinematics
Immerse yourself in a medieval fantasy world where kings and magical creatures collide in an epic showdown. In the realm of SkySouls, peace is threatened by the evil Demon King Ossur, who opens a portal to hell unleashing destruction. A young human, Solid, the son of a brave fallen soldier, emerges as the last hope for his world. He accompanies Solid on an epic journey as he faces deadly challenges, forges unlikely alliances, and discovers legendary artifacts. Face the darkness in "SkySouls", where bravery and magic intertwine in a fight for survival and peace.




→ Bow: Master precision and stealth as you fire arrows from the shadows, dealing damage at a distance.
→ Crossbow: Unleash deadly bolts with deadly precision and keep your enemies at bay from a distance.
→ Short Sword: Unleash quick slashes and agile attacks in close combat, keeping your enemies at bay.
→ Long Sword: Strike with force and precision with this versatile weapon that offers both quick slashes and powerful attacks.
→ warhammer: Destroy your enemies with brutal hammer blows, shattering armor and bone alike.
→ Magic: Master the arcane arts and cast devastating spells to devastate your enemies from a distance.
→ Sword and Shield: Find the balance between attack and defense while wielding a sword and shield, protecting yourself while delivering precise blows.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-4370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 6700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3500x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or AMD RX Vega-56
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
